exec: var response = pm.response.json();
// Extract the token from the response
var token = response.token;
// Set the token as an environment variable
pm.environment.set("authToken", "Bearer " + token);
// Log the token to the Postman console for debugging (optional)
console.log("Token set to environment variable 'authToken':", token);
var response = pm.response.json();
// Extract the token from the response
var franchiseId = response.id;
// Set the token as an environment variable
pm.environment.set("franchiseId", franchiseId);

exec: var response = pm.response.json();

var token = response.token;
// Set the token as an environment variable
pm.environment.set("authToken", "Bearer " + token);

pm.environment.set("orderId",  orderId);
